item.deicideadditions.showlore: Hold shift to show item lore
item.deicideadditions.oblivion_effigy.de: Use to reset your skill tree, at the cost of some of your skill points.
item.deicideadditions.oblivion_effigy.lo: An idol carved in the image of the bringer of balance. Its touch strips the soul bare so it may be forged anew.
item.deicideadditions.fire_dragon_cantee: A canteen infused with the magic of a fire dragon. Drinking this water grants it's powers for a limited time
item.deicideadditions.ice_dragon_canteen: A canteen infused with the magic of an ice dragon. Drinking this water grants it's powers for a limited time
item.deicideadditions.lightning_dragon_c: A canteen infused with the magic of a lightning dragon. Drinking this water grants it's powers for a limited time
effect.deicideadditions.warped_equilibri: The worldâ€™s balanced shatters under divine influence. You feel uncomfortable, and every twenty heartbeats, fate itself wavers, weakening blessings while strengthening afflictions. Only fortune can shield you from this influence.
Acranaxios's powers twist your essence ! %d blessing(s) falter and %d curse(s) intensify
effect.deicideadditions.despair.descript: A crushing presence suffocates your will. You are outmatched by the forces surrounding you.
effect.deicideadditions.grace.descriptio: The world spares you for an instant. Act, and this fleeting benediction will fade.
Excess consumes you. Your haste fails, your limbs tire, and the burden of gluttony drags you down.
deicideadditions.smithing.endwarrior.ing: Endermite Core or Stabilized Energy Conduit
deicideadditions.smithing.endwarrior.add: Add endermite core or stabilized energy conduit
event.deicideadditions.difficulty_increa: A unique boss has been slain, the difficulty of the world around you has increased.
event.deicideadditions.powerful_foe: This foe is beyond your reach ...
event.deicideadditions.overeating: Gluttony consumes you... Beware your endless appetite.
event.deicideadditions.cancel_eat: Sinners cannot consume food or drink
